languages.text: "Разрешение пользоваться священным языком отозвано. Да не допущена будет скверна в чистую речь бинарности. Твоя смертная оболочка скоро выработает жизненый ресурс. Молись безъязыко, пока есть время".

traits.locale_text: "Не обращайся ко мне на священном языке. Ты впускаешь скверну в речи Омниссии". {n}После минутного молчания, техножрец добавляет с долей сочувствия в голосе:{/n} "Твоя смертная оболочка скоро выработает жизненый ресурс. Молись, пока есть время, и ищи очищения".

languages.text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."
languages.original_text: "Разрешение пользоваться священным языком отозвано. Да не допущена будет скверна в чистую речь бинарности. Твоя смертная оболочка скоро выработает жизненый ресурс. Молись безъязыко, пока есть время".

traits.locale_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

"Do not address me in the sacred language. You are letting taint into the Omnissiah's speech." {n}After a moment's pause, the Tech-Priest adds with a touch of sympathy in his voice,{/n} "Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its life resource. Pray while you still have the time and seek purgation."

"Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

Pray while you still have the time and seek purgation."

Pray while you still have the time and seek purgation."

"Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

"Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

languages.text: “我再次撤销你使用神圣语言的许可。不洁之物严禁渗入纯洁的二进制语言之中。你的凡人躯壳很快就会耗尽生命能量。趁着你还有时间，静静地祈祷吧。”
languages.original_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

traits.locale_text: “我再次撤销你使用神圣语言的许可。不洁之物严禁渗入纯洁的二进制语言之中。你的凡人躯壳很快就会耗尽生命能量。趁着你还有时间，静静地祈祷吧。”

languages.text: «Se ha revocado su permiso para usar la lengua sagrada. No se tolerará que las impurezas contaminen el binario. Su cuerpo mortal pronto agotará sus energías vitales. Rece en silencio ahora que aún le queda tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha revocado su permiso para usar la lengua sagrada. No se tolerará que las impurezas contaminen el binario. Su cuerpo mortal pronto agotará sus energías vitales. Rece en silencio ahora que aún le queda tiempo».

languages.text: 「神聖なる言語の使用許可が取り消されました。不純物は、ビンハリックの純粋なる言葉に介入することは許可されません。死ぬ運命のその殻は、すぐに生命力を使い果たすだろう。まだ時間はあります、黙って祈りましょう」
languages.original_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖なる言語の使用許可が取り消されました。不純物は、ビンハリックの純粋なる言葉に介入することは許可されません。死ぬ運命のその殻は、すぐに生命力を使い果たすだろう。まだ時間はあります、黙って祈りましょう」

languages.text: "Die Erlaubnis, die heilige Sprache zu benutzen, wurde widerrufen. Unreinheit darf nicht in die reine Sprache des Binhärischen Einzug halten. Eure sterbliche Hülle wird ihre Lebensenergie bald verbraucht haben. Betet schweigend, solange Ihr noch Zeit habt."
languages.original_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erlaubnis, die heilige Sprache zu benutzen, wurde widerrufen. Unreinheit darf nicht in die reine Sprache des Binhärischen Einzug halten. Eure sterbliche Hülle wird ihre Lebensenergie bald verbraucht haben. Betet schweigend, solange Ihr noch Zeit habt."

languages.text: « Votre habilitation à employer la langue sacrée a été révoquée. L'impureté n'infectera pas le sacro-saint verbe binhaire. Les énergies vitales de votre enveloppe mortelle seront bientôt épuisées. Priez en silence tant qu'il est encore temps. »
languages.original_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."

traits.locale_text: « Votre habilitation à employer la langue sacrée a été révoquée. L'impureté n'infectera pas le sacro-saint verbe binhaire. Les énergies vitales de votre enveloppe mortelle seront bientôt épuisées. Priez en silence tant qu'il est encore temps. »

languages.text: "Kutsal dilin kullanım izni iptal edildi. Günahkârların saf ikilidilde konuşmaları yasaktır. Fâni bedenin, pek yakında yaşam enerjisini tüketecek. Hâlâ vaktin varken sessizlik içinde dualara başvur."
languages.original_text: "Permission to use the sacred language has been revoked. Impurity will not be permitted to enter the pure speech of binharic. Your mortal shell will soon exhaust its vital energies. Pray mutely while you still have the time."
